original_text: Continue to remember those in prison as if you were together with them in prison, and those who are mistreated as if you yourselves were suffering.
korean_text: 너희도 함께 갇힌 것 같이 갇힌 자를 생각하고 너희도 몸을 가졌은즉 학대 받는 자를 생각하라

sentences.original_text: Continue to remember those in prison
as if you were together with them in prison
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 자신도 그들과 함께 감옥에 있는 것처럼

sentences.original_text: as if you yourselves were suffering
